column3: str
Halt, featherless neuker! The soil upon which you tread, sullied, it is, by talon-less feet! Begone or be supper! Squark!
Squark! Here for labor, this one is! State your business or begone!
Squark! Here for labor, this one is? State your business or begone!
Squark! No more labor have we for you this day, featherless neuker! State your business or begone!
What will you ask?
About delivery quests.
About quotas.
About quest frequency.
About items in demand.
Nothing.
Squark! Our engineers, require more than simply cogs and cranks, they do. Eat, an Ixal must. Train, an Ixal must. Fight, an Ixal must!
But leave their work, they must not! Squark! So borrow the talon-less hands of adventurers, we shall. Talon-less hands, good at gathering, they are. Good at pilfering, they are!
Ehcatl Nine delivery quests are a type of allied society quest made available once a day (Earth time).
In addition to components for their airship, the <Emphasis>Dezul Qualan</Emphasis>, the Ixal also require other various items to maintain basic faction operations.
Delivery quests consist of three simple steps─accepting the quest, procuring the item, and delivering the goods to the Ehcatl Nine foreman.

The list of currently sought items can be viewed by either speaking with the foreman, or selecting <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Timers<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> under <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Duty<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> in the main menu.
Squark! What an Ixal craves, a featherless neuker knows not. Tell you, we shall─of what and how much!

Each item delivered will earn you points towards meeting your <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>quota<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>. Only when the quota is met will the quest be deemed complete.
Each individual delivery will earn you experience points for the class indicated to the left of the item name in the Ehcatl Nine Delivery Quest menu.
Completing an Ehcatl Nine delivery quest will earn experience points for your job or class at the time of completion, as well as improve your reputation with the faction.
Current quota progress can be viewed in the duty list and journal.
Squark! Eager, the featherless one is. Good! Good! But patient, you must be!

Delivery quests may only be accepted once a day (Earth time). Once you have accepted a delivery quest you will not be able to accept another until the following day, regardless of whether you complete or abandon it.
Delivery quests will also use one of your allied society quest allowances─an allowance that will not be reimbursed should you choose to abandon the quest.
Allowances are replenished once a day (Earth time).

Please be advised that the list of currently sought items will be updated each day at <ResetTime>01</ResetTime><If(TopLevelParameter(218))><Switch(TopLevelParameter(218))><Case(1)>1</Case><Case(2)>2</Case><Case(3)>3</Case><Case(4)>4</Case><Case(5)>5</Case><Case(6)>6</Case><Case(7)>7</Case><Case(8)>8</Case><Case(9)>9</Case><Case(10)>10</Case><Case(11)>11</Case><Case(12)>12</Case><Case(13)>1</Case><Case(14)>2</Case><Case(15)>3</Case><Case(16)>4</Case><Case(17)>5</Case><Case(18)>6</Case><Case(19)>7</Case><Case(20)>8</Case><Case(21)>9</Case><Case(22)>10</Case><Case(23)>11</Case></Switch><Else/>12</If> <If(GreaterThanOrEqualTo(TopLevelParameter(218),12))>p.m.<Else/>a.m.</If> (Earth time), and items previously sought may no longer be accepted.
Squark! Some things, we want. Some things, we <Emphasis>need</Emphasis>. Bring us what we need and much fortune shall you see! Squeee!
When viewing the list of items sought by the Ehcatl Nine, you may notice entries with a gold star (<Gui(67)/>) to their left.
This indicates that demand for the items is high, and they will earn you an experience bonus when delivered.
You will also earn extra experience points for delivering high-quality items, regardless of whether or not they are in demand.
